bm_ability_yakuza_injector_desc:
30s cooldown -1s cooldown on kill

When activated instantly recharges 100% of your stamina and, you gain 50% movement speed and 50% armor regeneration for 8 seconds, and when you use your melee weapon, you will receive self-damage if you miss (can't self-damage under 1% health)
bm_ability_burglar_luck_desc:
30s cooldown -1s cooldown on kill

When activated, you gain 30% dodge for 8 seconds.
bm_ability_med_x_desc:
50s cooldown -1s cooldown on kill

When activated, you receive -30% damage for 8 seconds.
bm_ability_auto_inject_super_stimpak_des:
210s cooldown -1s cooldown on kill

When downed it can be activated to instantly revive you
bm_ability_adrenaline_shot_desc:
2 shots with 60s cooldown -2s cooldown on kill

When activated instantly recharges 50% of your stamina and, you gain 40% interaction speed, 80% swap speed and reload speed for 10 seconds
bm_ability_spare_armor_plate_desc:
2 plates with 90s cooldown -1s cooldown on kill

When activated, you instantly regain armor
bm_ability_liquid_armor_desc:
90s cooldown -2s cooldown on kill

When activated, your max armor doubles for 10 seconds
bm_ability_blood_transfusion_desc:
40s cooldown -1s cooldown on kill

When activated, you gain 150% of your stored health and 100% of your max armor. It cannot overheal
bm_ability_wick_mode_desc:
50s cooldown -1s cooldown on kill

When activated, you have infinite ammo for 8 seconds and 50% Rate of fire (except for grenade/rocket launchers)
bm_ability_emergency_requisition_desc:
25s cooldown -1s cooldown on kill

When activated, your ammo pickup range becomes 30 meters and increases your Gambler healing by 50% for 2 seconds
bm_ability_the_mixtape_desc:
40s cooldown -1s cooldown on kill, -2s cooldown on melee kill

When activated for 4 seconds all the enemies in a 10 meter radius go in panic, and you gain 30% movement speed and 30% damage resistance
bm_ability_throwable_trip_mine_desc:
2 Trip mines with 100s cooldown -1s cooldown on kill, -2s cooldown on explosive kill

It places a trip mine with all the upgrades you own from the skill tree

You can't have 'too many' explosives - Mx
bm_ability_jet_desc:
40s cooldown -1s cooldown on kill

When activated instantly recharges 50% of your stamina and, you gain 30% movement speed for 8 seconds
bm_ability_whiff_desc:
40s cooldown -2s cooldown on kill

When activated stops the hysteria decay, you gain 40% interaction speed, 80% swap speed and reload speed for 8 seconds
dodgeopath_1_desc:
When you are surrounded by three enemies or more, you receive 12% less damage from enemies.
Your second and each consecutive melee hit within 1 second of the last one will deal 10 times its normal damage.
dodgeopath_5_desc: When you are within medium range of an enemy you recieve ##8%## less damage.
dodgeopath_7_desc:
Killing an enemy at medium range has a ##75%## chance to spread panic among your enemies.
Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.
This cannot occur more than once every ##1## second.
dodgeopath_9_desc: On melee or saw kill, you gain ##50%## movement speed for ##3## seconds, and you gain ##3## second of ##100%##. You also gain the ability to use ##the mixtape## throwable (optional)
dodgeopath_desc: Sociopath, but it's with dodge, speed and invulnerability on kil
fuel_backpack_desc:
BASIC:
Increase your flamethrower magazine size by ##50%## and increases your total ammo by ##25%##


ACED:
Increase your flamethrower magazine size by ##100%## and increases your total ammo by ##50%##
extender_desc:
BASIC:
Increase your flamethrower range by ##60% (16m)##


ACED:
Increase your flamethrower range by ##110% (21m)##
flaming_hands_desc:
BASIC:
Increase your flamethrower reload speed by ##45%##. You can hip fire the flamethrower while ##sprinting##


ACED:
Increase your flamethrower reload speed by ##75%##
everlasting_flames_desc:
BASIC:
Increase your flamethrower afterburn duration by ##50%## and increases your afterburn chance by ##10##


ACED:
Increase your afterburn duration by ##100%## and increases your afterburn chance by ##20##
cleansing_fire_desc:
BASIC:
Increase your flamethrower damage by ##50## but reduces the rate of fire by ##70%## and allows the flamethrower to ##shoot through## enemies


ACED:
Increase your flamethrower damage by an additional ##30##, for a total of ##70##, but reduces the rate of fire by ##60%## instead of ##70%##
thermal_bomb_desc:
BASIC:
Killing enemies gives ##Heat##.
At ##500## ##Heat##, the next enemy killed will ##Detonate## and ##burn## enemies within ##5m##

Harder enemies give more Heat.


ACED:
Reduced the Heat required to detonate by ##100##
